# Repository Structure Instructions

## Skill Organization

This repository uses a specific structure for organizing AI agent skills:

### Root-Level Skills (Example Collection)
- Each skill is a directory at repository root
- Directory name must be lowercase kebab-case
- Every skill MUST contain a `SKILL.md` file

### Document Skills Collection
- Located in `document-skills/` subdirectory
- Contains specialized skills for file formats: docx, pdf, pptx, xlsx
- These are reference implementations, not actively maintained

### Skill Directory Layout

**Minimal skill:**
```
my-skill/
  SKILL.md
```

**Complex skill:**
```
my-skill/
  SKILL.md          # Required: frontmatter + instructions
  scripts/          # Optional: executable helpers
  references/       # Optional: supporting docs
  assets/           # Optional: templates, resources
  ooxml/            # Optional: document-specific schemas
```

## Generated Directories (Do Not Manually Edit)

The following directories are auto-generated by `scripts/refresh_skill_collections.py`:

- `skills/` - Links to all active example skills
- `skills-document/` - Links to document skills
- `.codex/skills` - Codex agent bundle
- `.claude/skills` - Claude agent bundle
- `extensions/gemini/example-skills/skills` - Gemini example skills
- `extensions/gemini/document-skills/skills` - Gemini document skills
- `collections/example-skills.txt` - List of example skill paths
- `collections/document-skills.txt` - List of document skill paths

**Important**: These are committed artifacts. Always run refresh script after modifying skills and include changes in your PR.

## Version Files (Updated During Releases)

- `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` - Plugin metadata
- `extensions/gemini/example-skills/gemini-extension.json`
- `extensions/gemini/document-skills/gemini-extension.json`

## Documentation Files

- `README.md` - User-facing overview and installation guide
- `CLAUDE.md` - Claude Code-specific guidance
- `AGENTS.md` - Agent-level repository guidelines (references global /Users/4jp/AGENTS.md)
- `GEMINI.md` - Gemini CLI project overview
- `agent_skills_spec.md` - Skill schema reference and spec
- `CHANGELOG.md` - Version history
- `THIRD_PARTY_NOTICES.md` - License attributions
- `CONTRIBUTING.md` - Contribution guidelines
